column1: Uchi////When you come to Uchi bring a lot of $$$. If you want to get full here bring even more dollar signs. I come here whenever I'm in town just to try new dishes they have and they are usually amazing
column2: small but amazing. The nigiri and sashimi here are smaller than you'll find at a Blue Fish or even Kata but I like it. They don't have any entrees just small dishes and rolls. I guess if I eat more rolls i would get full but I don't really like rolls. I heard that happy hour is a good deal but I never been for happy hour.
